constituent: toy, king, jewel, ball, beginning, two, human legs
heisigStory: If, at some aboriginal level, Toys Я Us, then the archetypal ball must have been there at the beginning, before evolving into beach balls, ping-pong balls, rugby balls, and marbles.
koohiiStory1: The ball was the only thing that people at the beginning of time had to use as a toy. Poor cavemen.
koohiiStory2: And so it was, the ball marked the beginning of all the toys that were to come.
kunYomi: もちあそ.ぶ、もてあそ.ぶ
myStory: chữ Ngoạn. vờn chơi đùa bỡn. đồ chơi. vua bắt đầu công việc chơi đồ chơi.
